00025 #ifndef _BASE_DIFFERENCEEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_DIFFERENCEEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/BinaryOpExpression>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Difference operator - subtracts right arg from left arg
00037 //
00038 
00039 class DifferenceExpression : public BinaryOpExpression 
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   DifferenceExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> left, ref<ExpressionNode> right)
00043     : BinaryOpExpression(left, right) {}
00044   DifferenceExpression(const DifferenceExpression& e)
00045     : BinaryOpExpression(e) {}
00046 
00047   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(BinaryOp|Difference); } 
00048 
00049   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj DifferenceExpression(*this); }
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("DifferenceExpression"); }
00051 
00052   virtual ref<ExpressionNode> differentiate() const 
00053     { return ref<ExpressionNode>(NewObj DifferenceExpression(leftArg->differentiate(), rightArg->differentiate()) ); }
00054 
00055   virtual String toString() const { return String("(")+leftArg->toString() + "-" + rightArg->toString()+")"; }
00056 
00057 protected:
00058   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00059     { value = leftArg->evaluate(params) - rightArg->evaluate(params); valueCached=true; }
00060 
00061   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00062     { BinaryOpExpression::operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); addsub++; }
00063   
00064 };
00065 
00066 } // base
00067 
00068 #endif
